Having played the first one. All I can say about this one is that it's an absolutely perfect sequel. It has all the same humor, the same visual style but a little more polished, the same mechanics as well as some new ones. And some very entertaining dialogue with the same dark sense of humor, even with two new voices saying new lines. You get to learn more about the main villains backstory.

And I don't even know where to begin on the cooperation test chambers, or the community ones. Doing tests with a partner where you need to work together to get further is just a fantastic experience. And having played the community test chambers, they are made SO WELL! The way they're made is so well that they could be placed into the game's story and still fit.

So yeah... this is a great sequel to a great game.

Cs:go'daki sürüyle problem yüzünden Valve şirketine pek güvenmediğinizi biliyorum (hileler falan açmayın konuyu kafam bozulacak yine) ama bu kesinlikle öyle değil abiler Counter'daki hatalarını düzeltmek için elinden geleni yapmış robotik, bilim kurgu ve fantastik olmasına rağmen sonunda ağlayabilirsiniz (şahsen ben öyle yaptım) sanırım 10 saate bitirdim eğer alırsanız hızlı oynamayın keyfini çıkarın benim gibi 10 saatte oynayıp bırakmayın alt yazıları açıp Türkçe yapmayı unutmayın lakin oyunun en önemli kısmından biri diyaloglar ve şakalar spoiler vermemek için zor duruyorum hemen başlayın oynamaya

Думаете что вы умный? Сможете решить любую головоломку или любое квадратное уравнение? Тогда проверьте свой разум в программе вечного тестирования! Проходите испытания и развлекайтесь, но если у вас есть друг или подруга, то попробуйте выбраться вместе! 
 P.S. Очень рекомендую к прохождения особенно в кооперативе. Игрушка интересная и действительно стоит вашего внимания. (╯°□°）╯︵(.o.)

只有没玩过传送门的玩家，没有觉得传送门不好玩的玩家，品质极高的游戏，趣味性爆表。每次实在打不动忍不住看攻略后的顿悟感和觉得自己个傻逼的感觉也是这个游戏的一大乐趣所在，况且这个游戏竟然还有如此引人入胜的剧情和超有代入感的音乐，绝对的好评。目前只通了单人剧情，后面希望后面能有个好朋友能和我把双人线给通了吧，hhhh。还有就是G胖快点出3啊！！！！！！！！！

I have to say, after recently revisiting the portal games after playing them on the 360 years ago, i came to the conclusion that they are masterpieces. They are just super fun while being incredibly smart both gameplay and story/presentation wise. The acting is great, the jokes hit just right every time, and the writing makes this game and the original portal some of the best satirical stories i've ever had the joy of experiencing. Worth every penny, and for the dirt cheap prices of a steam sale, it's a no brainer.
